mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM INBOUND WHERE INBOUND_CODE = #{inb_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INBOUND (IIDX, INBOUND_CODE, PCH_CODE, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_DEL, ITEM_QTY, ITEM_EXP, WH_CODE, IN_STATUS, INBOUND_DATE, EMPLOYEE_CODE, INB_MEMO, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (INBOUND_NO.NEXTVAL, #{INBOUND_CODE}, #{PCH_CODE}, #{ITEM_CODE}, #{ITEM_DEL}, #{ITEM_QTY}, #{ITEM_EXP}, #{WH_CODE}, #{IN_STATUS}, #{INBOUND_DATE}, #{EMPLOYEE_CODE}, #{INB_MEMO}, SYSTIMESTAMP, NULL)
